entry.title: I'm Gonna Show You Crazy
entry.summary:
Author: evvie_99

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,039Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 192

Summary: He tried to warn Scott and the others but they all thought he was just being paranoid. But then Scott went and welcomed him with open arms. Now everyone he came to care about was in danger and the True idiot had no idea. The worst part of it all, is that Theo was right. There was a part of him that enjoyed the feeling of fear that poured off of everyone around him when he was possessed. The way even the wolves would cower away and silently beg for their lives as the Oni tore through everything and everyone at his command. It was a hunger from deep inside that was begging to be satiated. Unfortunately for him, he was too similar to the dark fox. And that need would never be filled, he’d be just as insatiable and just as destructive as the Nogitsune. Which is why he didn’t bother denying the truth that spilled from Theo’s mouth.

entry.title: AS IF WE NEVER EXISTED
entry.summary:
Author: evvie_99

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,463Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 57

Summary: They stood facing each other in the middle of the woods. Derek pursed his lips before coming to a decision.“Alright. But I do have one condition, if you want me to change you myself.”Stiles looked slightly hesitant but nodded. “Anything.”The corners of Derek’s mouth twitch slightly. “And then forever.”“That’s what I’m asking.” Stiles whispered.Derek stared at him for a few more seconds before responding again.“Marry me, Stiles.”Stiles let out a startled gasp. Of all the things Derek could have possibly wanted, this wasn’t what Stiles had imagined.

entry.title: Growing Pains
entry.summary:
Author: Sterektrashbag (vannybees)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,479Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: When virgins start dying in town Stiles is instantly terrified. Not only because he’s a virgin himself but also because somehow any time something bad is happening in town these days, it always ends up involving him and/or the pack in some way. So he thinks he’s more than allowed to be terrified about the whole thing.He bombards Derek with texts about it. Asking for updates and if they should have another pack meeting to go over things again. Derek already held an emergency pack meeting about the situation. They’re all monitoring it best they can but it doesn’t change the fact that Stiles is still a human virgin who is definitely going to end up dead. The Alpha reassures him with platitudes so Stiles ends up having to spell it out for him plain and simple. “I need to get fucked, Derek”. He immediately regrets texting that but he’s kind of panicking over here. Derek’s eventual reply makes his panic momentarily evaporate: “You’re right.”

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,257Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 96

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 118,264Chapters: 42/45Kudos: 201

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive. The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation. As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,114Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 41

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. Not angry. Not loud. Certain. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” Derek nods once, reflexive. “When you speak,” Talia continues, “you do so as a Hale. As Alpha blood. Your indulgences do not absolve you of that.” ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions, and a mistake he keeps repeating.

entry.title: Nothing Like Losing a Limb
entry.summary:
Author: ash_mcj

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,871Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 1,094

Summary: Once the smoke dissipated after the tragedy at Hale Manor, the survivors of the once-thriving pack were scattered like ash in the wind. For some, the next two years passed like a suffocating gust of wind, pinning them to the burning embers they could never quite heal from. For others, it dragged on slowly, allowing their scars to fade as they watched the grass on their scorched life regrow. Though, one thing was for certain: none of them came out of the flames unscathed.[or: derek self-destructs, allison finds strength and guidance in the side of her bloodline she’d never thought to explore, cora learns to survive in treacherous conditions, jackson attempts to function without his other half, and the stilinskis try so hard not to completely crumble that they inadvertently build themselves a new pack to protect the hale territory]

entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 158,691Chapters: 46/?Kudos: 183

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now. Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house. He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,831Chapters: 13/40Kudos: 78

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn’t hate the cage that once held him.They’d build a stronger one.

entry.title: After Almost
entry.summary:
Author: she_mammoth

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,551Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: Derek stops it before it gets out of hand. Stiles is seventeen, too young, far too reckless, and Derek is terrified of crossing a line he can never uncross. He tells himself it's the right thing to do. Stiles will find someone his own age. He deserves that, someone uncomplicated. Derek never imagined that someone would be his son.
